summary: Paranormal investigating website serving Oklahoma only, founded 2025
architectural_notes: Service area is explicitly limited to Oklahoma only

existing_features.title: Create a home page that introduces the paranormal investigation service with sections for: hero introduction, about the investigation team, services offered, and contact information

Implement a case submission form where users can report paranormal activity including fields for: location, type of phenomena, description of events, contact details, and optional photo upload capability

Create a case gallery page displaying submitted paranormal cases with filtering options by phenomena type (e.g., apparitions, unexplained sounds, objects moving, electromagnetic anomalies) and location
Create an investigation resources page with information about: types of paranormal phenomena, investigation equipment and methods, evidence documentation guidelines, and safety precautions

Apply a mysterious, atmospheric visual design with a dark color scheme using deep purples, midnight blues, and ethereal greens, combined with vintage investigation aesthetics including distressed textures, ghostly typography, and subtle animated effects that evoke the paranormal theme
Render generated images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated including the paranormal investigation hero background and investigation team logo
Update the footer section in the Layout component to display 'Founded 2025' instead of any existing founding year text
Update the 'About the Investigation Team' section on the home page to reflect that the team has 1 year of experience in paranormal investigation
Update the 'About the Investigation Team' section on the home page to indicate the team consists of 2 or more members
Create a new 'Meet the Team' page route accessible at '/team' that displays information about the paranormal investigation team members
Design the Meet the Team page to showcase individual team member profiles including their name, role/specialty in paranormal investigation, brief biography, and profile photo
Add a 'Team' or 'Meet the Team' navigation link to the header menu in the Layout component that routes to the new team page
Remove the '/team' route from the App.tsx router configuration
Remove the 'Team' or 'Meet the Team' navigation link from the Layout component header menu
Delete the frontend/src/pages/Team.tsx file
Update the hero section on the Home page to prominently display that the paranormal investigation service operates exclusively in Oklahoma
Update the 'About the Investigation Team' section on the Home page to explicitly state the team only investigates cases within Oklahoma
Update the services/phenomena type cards on the Home page to include text indicating these services are available only in Oklahoma
Add a prominent notice on the Case Submission form (SubmitCase.tsx) stating that only cases within Oklahoma will be accepted
Update the Case Gallery page (CaseGallery.tsx) to display a header or banner stating that all displayed cases are from Oklahoma investigations
Update the Resources page (Resources.tsx) to include introductory text stating the resources are specifically for paranormal investigation in Oklahoma
Update the footer in the Layout component to display 'Serving Oklahoma Since 2025' or similar text that combines both the geographic area and founding year

Update the header/navigation area in the Layout component to include a tagline or subtitle mentioning 'Oklahoma's Paranormal Investigators' or similar text that reinforces the Oklahoma-only service area
Update the HTML document title in index.html to include 'Oklahoma' and reflect the geographic focus of the paranormal investigation service

Update the footer text in the Layout component (frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx) to change 'Serving Oklahoma Since 2025' to 'Founded in Oklahoma, 2025' or similar text that clarifies Oklahoma as the location where the business was founded, while maintaining the founding year of 2025

new_feature_requests.summary: Build backend data models and storage for paranormal cases including: case ID, submission timestamp, location, phenomena type, description, reporter contact information, investigation status, and associated photo references
Update all website content to emphasize Oklahoma-only service area and 2025 founding year
